PackageOracle.name: DA_QUOTE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_QUOTE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.13.254439000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,quote_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,quote_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_quote;

body.name: DA_QUOTE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_QUOTE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.13.263571000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,quote_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_quote.add, parms=' || quote_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_quote a
(
a.quote_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.quote_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_quote.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,quote_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_quote.del, parms=' || quote_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_quote a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.quote_id = del.quote_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_quote.del');

END del;

END da_quote;
